name: Solar System (itch) (ccara001)
description:
This is a Solar System I created in Java Script (p5js) in my 1st year of University with a bit of help. It is not a game but I do really love the way it turned out and thought it deserved to be published! It was a very exciting project as it plays right into my love of Astronomy so I made sure it turned out perfectly.

So far I have the Sun, Venus, Earth and its moon and Mars and its 2 moons. I may add other planets later on.

Enjoy!
